name: GamerBoi And The Seven Lost Breadsticks
name_original: GamerBoi And The Seven Lost Breadsticks
description:
GamerBoi must embark on a journey to retrieve his beloved olive garden breadsticks.

WASD to move.

Space to Jump

S lets you burrow into the ground.

While burrowing, you cannot move, yet you are invincible.

If GamerBoi is slightly darkened, they are currently burrowed.GamerBoi may be darkened, even when not burrowed due to glitches.

Around 20 seconds of gameplay.
